Instructions:

Each writeup should be about 3 to 4 pages single spaced. This should include the following:

• title and authors

• text descriptions

• figures

• references

Each research or experimental evaluation writeup should have the following sections:

• Introduction: Problem, research question(s), approach

• Approach

• Methodology such as datasets, algorithms/tools, evaluation criteria

• Related work

For an experimental evaluation writeup, the evaluation criteria often includes a manual review of the tool(s).
